price: 12. Le peuple de Noé, les gens d’Ar-Rass et les Thamûd avaient déjà, avant eux, crié au mensonge.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
